Name: Heroes of Agora
About the game: Very simple multiplayer online 3rd person PvP combat arena featuring both ranged and melee style combat. This is basic, barebones, straight up PvP, no main menu, no options, no matchmaking, just make a lobby or join one. Key features : a variety of characters to choose from, 2-8 players in one arena and three different arenas to choose between. You can either get up close and personal with a melee character like Ol' Saint Rik and deal out the pain up close with brutal combo attacks or stay back and pick your opponents off from a distance with characters like Rampage who likes to launch rocks at his enemies.
